Case 1:10-cv-03396 Document 142 Filed 04/21/08 Page 8 of 15
By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.

DOJ-OGR-00002619

additional_notes: The document appears to be a Non-Prosecution Agreement signed by Jeffrey Epstein and various attorneys. The document is dated 9/24/07 and was filed on 04/21/08. The document has some handwritten text and signatures.
